title: Account Specific Settings
body: Hello everyone,  so I logged onto my friend's PC today and I noticed that the game's settings are set specifically for my friend's computer (like sound, smart cast/normal cast, video, interface etc.) and I had to change some of the settings in order to allow me to play properly. This got me thinking. Would it possible for Riot to implement in-game settings made specifically for each account. This way players don't need to spend so much time adjusting settings at the start of a match and focus on gameplay. Please consider.
